@graph.name: Vegan Thai Green Curry Noodles with Tofu - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Ready in under 30 minutes, these easy Vegan Thai Green Curry Noodles are the perfect simple weeknight dinner recipe.

@graph.name: Green Curry Noodles Stir Fry
@graph.description: Ready in under 30 minutes, these Vegan Thai Green Curry Noodles are the perfect simple weeknight dinner recipe. They’re naturally vegan, packed with healthy veggies, fragrant with flavor and pair perfectly with any plant-based protein you want to add.  No need for store-bought curry paste!
recipeIngredient: 1  hot green chili (use a mild one if you don't want the heat or remove the seeds for less heat)
3/4 cup of packed cilantro with stems
2  green onions chopped (keep the greens for garnish)
1/2-1 cup of other vegetables of choice such as mushrooms (broccoli, baby eggplant)
6 ounces of rice noodles or linguini (cooked according to the instructions on the package)
pepper flakes,  (black pepper and green onions for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the green curry paste. Add all of the ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the green curry paste. Add all of the ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles according to instruction on package and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the noodles according to instruction on package and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a skillet over medium high heat. Add oil. Add the tofu and cook until the tofu is golden in the edges then add in the white parts of the onion and bell pepper and other veggies that you're using.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a skillet over medium high heat. Add oil. Add the tofu and cook until the tofu is golden in the edges then add in the white parts of the onion and bell pepper and other veggies that you're using.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a good dash of salt and cook for 3-4 minutes. Move the veggies to the edge of  the skillet so that you can pour the green curry paste in the middle. Pour the green curry in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a good dash of salt and cook for 3-4 minutes. Move the veggies to the edge of  the skillet so that you can pour the green curry paste in the middle. Pour the green curry in.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the paste is starting to boil, mix it in. Add in the noodles and toss well to coat. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. I usually add in 1/2 a teaspoon of sugar at this point to balance out the flavor. Adjust the salt, and sweet, and heat at the end. Then serve with pepper flakes, black pepper and green onions as garnish.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the paste is starting to boil, mix it in. Add in the noodles and toss well to coat. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. I usually add in 1/2 a teaspoon of sugar at this point to balance out the flavor. Adjust the salt, and sweet, and heat at the end. Then serve with pepper flakes, black pepper and green onions as garnish.
